query: "What is my current Body Mass Index and employment status based on my medical records?"
resource_summaries: This excerpt contains information about a finalized Body Mass Index (BMI) observation for a patient, with a value of 32.02 kg/m2, recorded on December 28, 2020.
answer: Based on your medical records, your current Body Mass Index (BMI) is 32.02 kg/m2 as of December 28, 2020. Unfortunately, there is no information regarding your employment status in the provided summaries.
